com.adobe.exm.exception

Class EXPException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.adobe.exm.exception.EXPException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class EXPException
extends Exception
    Exception for any exceptions or errors during processing
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
